rules.description: left_control → command + tab (alone) | left_command (held, on Emacs)
left_control → command + tab (alone) | left_option + left_command (held, outside Emacs)
right_control → toggle Emacs/Chrome (alone) | Control + Alt (held, on Emacs)
right_control → toggle Emacs/Chrome (alone) | righ_command + right_control (held, outside Emacs)
outside Emacs, left_shift → Option + control (alone) | hyphen (held)
right_shift → en dash (alone) | Super + Alt (held on Emacs)
outside Emacs, equal_sign → equal_sign (alone) | left_shift + left_option (held)
On Emacs, command + space → trigger different events on Emacs and elsewhere
On Emacs, disable OSX behavior of command + h
On Emacs, disable OSX behavior of command + ?
On Emacs: diacritics if pressed in succession, otherwise hyper-super modifier
